respStmt.name: Name

publicationStmt.p: Indication of work done and date 06/30/15, Wheaton College

sourceDesc.p: From the Marion B. Gebbie Archives and Special Collections at the Madeleine Clark Wallace Library, Wheaton College

row.cell: To 1 peck quinces two days since 6/B.
To absence threr x ½ dys 60x

Geo L. Hovey
D debtor To tax 288 & 60
To chips x wood 7/6 cart milk
To ½ Beef Rye cart milk 6/
To ½ Bush. Potatoes cart milk
" Carting same x other Loads as/Bill
To cash a few days as/ pr receipt
